entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Tracadie-Sheila
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
